mods.abstract: $30 REWARD. BROKE Jail at Baton Rouge on the night of the 22d instant, three negro men as follows -- JIM, a griff, aout 5 feet 8 1/2 inches high and about 28 or 30 years old-- has some scars on his neck and one on his forehead over the left ey, caused by a burn or scrofula--very intelligent and quick spoken. JOHN, a boy, 19 years old five feet 2 inches high ; very black nose inclined to Roman, very round and compactly built. LEWIS, about 5 feet 8 1/2 high, black and very ragged dressed in old whit homespun cotton. Jim and John both have gray kersey cappots new--also new shoes. I will give the above reward for the delivery to me of the above negroes, or $10 dollars for either of them. JAS. J. ODOM, Jailor. oct25-tf
